attributes.review: this app stinks. literally. after i opened it my phone started overheating and some weird smell came out of it. i don’t know, it kinda smelled like racism and bigotry to me. 10/10 WOULD NOT recommend, unless you want your phone to stink too.
attributes.title: this app stinks

attributes.review: When I opened the app it honestly stunk up the whole room with this absolutely horrendous odor. I sprayed some fabreez thinking that would help, but alas it did not work... now my whole house stinks like poopie and it’s this app’s fault.
attributes.title: Why does it smell so bad when I open the app??

attributes.review:
DO NOT GET THIS APP! This app is filled with so much racism, sexism, and homophobia you would think it was made as a part of a hate crime.  As a part of the LGBTQ+ community I felt that the cinnamon hitler on this app was targeting specific individuals and cares about no one but himself. The man has no human decency and it shows in this app.

Oh. And it crashes.
attributes.title: RACIST SEXIST HOMOPHOBIC APP
